thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Ambarella Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.04

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ambarella Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.04
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Ambarella Inc:
* AMBARELLA, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.45
* Q4 REVENUE FELL 19.3 PERCENT TO $70.6 MILLION * SEES Q1 OF FISCAL YEAR 2019 REVENUE BETWEEN $54.5 MILLION AND $57.5 MILLION
* QTRLY ADJUSTED GROSS MARGIN 64.7% VERSUS 67.2% * SEES Q1 OF FISCAL YEAR 2019 GROSS MARGIN ON A NON-GAAP BASIS TO BE BETWEEN 60.0% AND 62.0%
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37, REVENUE VIEW $70.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $58.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
